data.title: Kevin D. Buchanan — Davis, Bethune & Jones
data.text:
Kevin grew up around lawyers. His father is an attorney which naturally drew Kevin to the profession at a young age as he spent many summers working at his father’s law firm. This experience taught Kevin about the work ethic needed to help bring clients resolution.

Kevin is a Kansas City native. Shortly after receiving his undergraduate degree from New York University, he began law school at the University of Missouri. While in law school, Kevin was on the Dean’s List and his writing was published in the Missouri Law Review. Upon graduating, Kevin return to Kansas City, where he was hired by DBJ after passing the bar. Kevin is driven by a desire to help his clients seek justice and hold wrongdoers accountable.

In his free time, Kevin enjoys playing golf and spending time with his friends and family.

After growing up in Kansas City, Kevin graduated from New York University with a Bachelor of Arts degree in 2015. During college, he clerked at a defense firm and was a member of the Nu Epsilon Chapter of Phi Gamma Delta. Kevin earned his Juris Doctor from the University of Missouri School of Law in 2018, attaining the Dean’s List for academic excellence. Kevin was a Note and Comment Editor for the Missouri Law Review and a member of the Board of Advocates. He also received multiple C.A.L.I. awards for his work in the classroom. During law school, he interned for the Honorable Gary D. Witt of the Western District of Missouri Court of Appeals and clerked at DBJ.

Kevin focuses his practice on the areas of personal injury, products liability, premises liability, commercial litigation, auto accidents, tractor-trailer litigation, medical malpractice, and class action work.
